amendment.description: Amendment requires disclosure of any federal funding used by a person or a governmental or non-governmental entity in bringing a claim in a covered suit.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 113-563 to require disclosure of any federal funding used by a person or a governmental or non-governmental entity in bringing a claim in a covered suit.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Duffy amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Duffy.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Duffy amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
